ruling: - [[Cold Wave]] can only be activated when you start your Main Phase 1. If you activate any other effects or Normal Summon or Set a monster during your Main Phase 1, you cannot activate [[Cold Wave]].
- The Ignition-like effects of Continuous Spell or Trap Cards like [[Blaze Accelerator]] cannot be activated while [[Cold Wave]]'s effect is applied.
- The Trigger Effects of Spell and Trap Cards, like [[Begone, Knave!]] or [[Card of Safe Return]], cannot activate while [[Cold Wave]]'s effect is applied.
